/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
